channel.title: DHCP :: CIS 527 Textbook
channel.description: YouTube Video Resources Slides Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) on Wikipedia Bootstrap Protocol (BOOTP) on Wikipedia What is DHCP? (Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol) from Lifewire ISC DHCP Open Source Software for DHCP Servers Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (RFC 2131) Standard from IETF Link-Local Address on Wikipedia Video Transcript The Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol, or DHCP, is a core part of operating any network today. This video will introduce DHCP and demonstrate how it works.
